attributes.action: Stop the anti-car and carbon foot-print propaganda and deal with the real issues to limit pollution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why does the government insist on punishing drivers for the cars they drive when we could cut global warming down more effectively in other areas? 

-Stop importing bottled water from abroad and use our own.

-Livestock produces a much larger share of more harmful greenhouse gases. It generates 65 percent of human-related nitrous oxide, which has 296 times the Global Warming Potential of CO2.

-Diesel trains in rural Britain are more polluting than 4x4 vehicles. D. Alexander said: “If ten or fewer people travel in a train, it would be less environmentally damaging to give them each a Land Rover Freelander and tell them to drive” 

-Burning wood for fuel is better for the environment than recycling it.

-Someone who installs a “green” lightbulb undoes a year’s worth of energy-saving by buying two bags of imported veg, as so much carbon is wasted flying the food to Britain 

-Trees, regarded as shields against global warming because they absorb carbon, were found to be major producers of methane, a much more harmful greenhouse gas.
